name: Trazodone Hydrochloride

ingredients.name: SODIUM STARCH GLYCOLATE TYPE A POTATO

indications.text: trazodone hydrochloride tablets selective serotonin reuptake inhibitor indicated treatment major depressive disorder ( mdd ) ( 1 ) .

contraindications.text: starting dose : 150 mg divided doses daily . may increased 50 mg per day every three four days . maximum dose : 400 mg per day divided doses ( 2 ) . trazodone hydrochloride tablets taken shortly meal light snack ( 2 ) . tablets swallowed whole broken half along score line , chewed crushed ( 2 ) . discontinued , gradual dose reduction recommended ( 2 ) .

warningsAndPrecautions: trazodone hydrochloride tablets , usp 150 mg available oral white white , oval , flat faced beveled edge uncoated tablets full bisect two partial trisects . debossed `` 13 `` bisect `` 32 `` one side `` 50 50 50 `` side . 150 mg , entire tablet . ndc : 70518-3479-00 ndc : 70518-3479-01 ndc : 70518-3479-02 packaging : 30 1 bottle plastic packaging : 30 1 blister pack packaging : 90 1 bottle plastic store 20° 25°c ( 68° 77°f ) . excursions permitted 15° 30°c ( 59° 86°f ) [ usp controlled room temperature ] . dispense child-resistant closure tight , light-resistant container defined usp . repackaged distributed : remedy repack , inc. 625 kolter dr. suite # 4 indiana , pa 1-724-465-8762
adverseReactions: concomitant monoamine oxidase inhibitors ( maois ) , within 14 days stopping maois ( 4 ) .
indications_original: Trazodone hydrochloride tablets are a selective serotonin reuptake inhibitor indicated for the treatment of major depressive disorder (MDD) ( 1 ).
contraindications_original: Starting dose: 150 mg in divided doses daily. May be increased by 50 mg per day every three to four days. Maximum dose: 400 mg per day in divided doses ( 2 ). Trazodone hydrochloride tablets should be taken shortly after a meal or light snack ( 2 ). Tablets should be swallowed whole or broken in half along the score line, and should not be chewed or crushed ( 2 ). When discontinued, gradual dose reduction is recommended ( 2 ).
warningsAndPrecautions_original:
Trazodone Hydrochloride Tablets, USP 150 mg are available for oral administration as white to off white, oval, flat faced beveled edge uncoated tablets with a full bisect and two partial trisects. Debossed "13" bisect "32" on one side and "50 50 50" on other side.
                  For 150 mg, use the entire tablet.
                  
                  NDC: 70518-3479-00
                  NDC: 70518-3479-01
                  NDC: 70518-3479-02
                  PACKAGING: 30 in 1 BOTTLE PLASTIC
                  PACKAGING: 30 in 1 BLISTER PACK
                  PACKAGING: 90 in 1 BOTTLE PLASTIC
                  
                  Store at 20° to 25°C (68° to 77°F). Excursions permitted between 15° to 30°C (59° to 86°F) [see USP Controlled Room Temperature].
                  Dispense with a child-resistant closure in a tight, light-resistant container as defined in the USP.
                  
                  Repackaged and Distributed By:
                  Remedy Repack, Inc.
                  625 Kolter Dr. Suite #4 Indiana, PA 1-724-465-8762
adverseReactions_original: Concomitant use of monoamine oxidase inhibitors (MAOIs), or use within 14 days of stopping MAOIs ( 4 ).
